title: Define content policy + tone guardrails (edgy but brand-safe)
description: Document what explicit content is allowed in conversation vs branding, and tone boundaries for the AI persona.

title: Prediction markets monetization (micro-payments via stablecoins)
description: Define crypto-based micro-payment approach and how it ties to prediction markets (later phase).

title: Finalize MVP scope + phased roadmap (P0/P1/P2)
description: Lock P0 feature list and define the sequence for P1/P2 expansion.

title: AI chat spec (persona, memory, saved threads)
description: Define chat capabilities, voice/tone guidelines, and memory summarization strategy.

title: Persona customization spec (name + voice selection)
description: Allow per-user persona naming and tone/voice selection options.

title: Legal/privacy safety checklist (disclaimer + data handling)
description: Define disclaimers, sensitive data handling, and consent/opt-in boundaries.

title: Daily feed spec (personal + tea + celebrity)
description: Define feed sections, content rules, personalization logic, and sharing/saving actions.

title: Open questions + decisions log
description: Capture unresolved product decisions and document final choices as they are made.

title: Privacy architecture (on-device AI, data retention, deletion)
description: Define local vs cloud processing, encryption approach, and user-controlled memory deletion.

title: Monetization plan (tiers + credit system)
description: Define free vs paid features, subscription tiers, and credits usage.

title: Diary cadence settings (weekly default + user control)
description: Define prompt scheduling options (daily/weekly/off) and default weekly cadence.

title: Birth time requirement + fallback flow
description: Define required birth time input, fallback to sun/moon/rising when unknown, and upload flow for natal data.

title: Map core retention loops (daily, archive, social)
description: Document the daily check-in, personal archive, and social/virality loops with triggers and outputs.

title: Specify target audience + positioning statement
description: Define primary persona(s), tone boundaries, and how the app differs from existing astrology products.

title: Convex data model + collections outline
description: Design core collections (users, charts, chats, journals, feed, relationships, tarot, predictions).

title: AI/RAG content architecture plan
description: Define knowledge sources, retrieval strategy, and summarization/memory storage.

title: Astrology API research (natal chart upload + calculations)
description: Evaluate AstroAPI/Swiss Ephemeris options and document integration approach for later phases.

title: Rolling diary spec (prompts, mood tags, AI reflection)
description: Define journal entry structure, prompt system, mood tagging, and optional AI reflection flow.

title: Relationship module spec (compatibility + situationship)
description: Define relationship add flow, compatibility output, and situationship mode behavior.

title: Define product north star + success criteria
Branding directions + name shortlists
description: Explore 2â€“3 visual directions and propose name/voice options.

title: iOS on-device model plan (Apple Intelligence + local models)
description: Define iOS local model usage, limits, and how it complements cloud models later.

title: US-only launch constraints + compliance checklist
description: Capture US-only scope assumptions, age gating considerations, and compliance constraints for launch.

title: Prediction markets spec (virtual credits, rules)
description: Define market types, credits system, outcome resolution, and safety constraints.

title: Tarot feature spec (daily pull + interpretation)
description: Define daily tarot flow, card catalog, and interpretation structure.

title: Onboarding spec (progressive disclosure + chart capture)
description: Design the onboarding flow from sun sign to full chart, including optional relationship adds.
